data.title: Matthew Florianz on LinkedIn: Come join the Celebration. Join Crytek
data.text:
We're looking to hire an Audio Designer to join us Team Junkfish. You will have the opportunity to work alongside a friendly, diverse and dynamic team. As an Audio Designer, working closely with the audio lead, you will take ownership of audio content production, creating high quality audio assets and implementation within Unreal Engine 5. SG Salary: SGD 3,000 to SGD 5,000 per month UK Salary: ¬£30,000 to ¬£36,000 per annum We encourage you to apply regardless of gender, race, disability, sexual orientation, religion, age or any other diversifying factor as we strive to improve equal opportunities and accessibility within the industry. Find out more information and apply on our website: https://lnkd.in/gtjW7uRp

Another one for our Audio team in Guildford! We are looking for a Senior Voice Engineer to join us in creating amazing dialogue for our future titles. As the name would suggest this role requires a great amount of technical expertise but also great people skills. You will be working face to face with actors, directors as well as all other associated teams so a degree of social ambidexterity is a must (which is a pretentious way of saying being able to speak comfortably with game development professionals just as easily as those without any knowledge of the area). For more details on the role please see the link below üëá https://lnkd.in/ewu_uvH4

We're #hiring! We have a new role just opened, we're looking for an Associate Audio Director. This is an awesome opportunity to work with the super talented Nicholas Raynor Please feel free to DM should you wish to know more :) *This role is UK based* #gamedevjobs #audiojobs #gamejobs

Are any of my connections looking for an Environment Art role? You will be joining a growing team working on our Train Sim World titles and beyond! Drop me a message if you need more info. This is a fully remote opportunity.
